alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:28AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Muscogee and central Chattahoochee Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 124 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near North Fort Moore, or 8 miles northwest of Cusseta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cusseta, North Fort Benning, Sand Hill, Custer Road Terrace, Eelbeck/West Fort Benning, Vista Terrace and Benning Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
